actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to prevent Members of Congress from receiving a cost-of-living pay adjustment in October 1977.

summary.text: Prohibits cost-of-living salary adjustments for Members of Congress, pursuant to the Legislative reorganization Act of 1946, on or after October 1, 1977, and before October 1, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to prevent Members of Congress from receiving a cost-of-living pay adjustment in October 1977.
